name: Nico & Lgogo
description:
Golem Input :

Left Arrow = Left Arm / Right Arrow = Right Arm / Up Arrow = Up Selected Arm / Down Arrow = Down Selected Arm.

M = Take the hooks

P = Penetrate the tower with your arm

Player Input :

Q and D = walk Right and Left

Z = Jump

Credits :

Victor Jaffeux - Alexandre Harbuzinski - Arnaud Chalier - Tom Bouery - Nicolas Tardivier - Nicolas Mazeret
